meanings.sent1: The kitten was wrapt in a cozy blanket.
meanings.sent2: She felt wrapt in warmth as she snuggled under the soft quilt.
meanings.sent3: The gift was so beautifully wrapt, it was almost too pretty to open.
meanings.sent4: The forest was wrapt in mist, creating an ethereal atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The child's face lit up as she saw the birthday present wrapt in shiny paper.

meanings.definition: Completely absorbed or engrossed in something
meanings.sent1: The students were wrapt in the fascinating story the teacher was telling.
meanings.sent2: He was wrapt in thought, trying to solve the challenging puzzle.
meanings.sent3: The movie was so captivating that the audience was wrapt in silence.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was wrapt in memories of the joyful summer days.
meanings.sent5: The musician was wrapt in the melody, lost in the beauty of the music.
